text: Speak to yourself the way you'd speak to your favorite person.
author: Anonymous

text: Practice makes progress; progress builds pride.
author: Anonymous

text: You don't have to be loud to be confident.
author: Anonymous

text: The mirror is a canvas; paint it with kindness.
author: Anonymous

text: Stand tall, even when your voice is small.
author: Anonymous

text: Comparison drains joy; attention refills it.
author: Anonymous

text: Boundaries are self-respect in action.
author: Anonymous

text: Confidence is built by keeping promises to yourself.
author: Anonymous

text: Let your inner critic be a coach, not a judge.
author: Anonymous

text: Collect small wins; they weigh heavy.
author: Anonymous

text: Your worth is not up for negotiation.
author: Anonymous

text: You are allowed to outgrow who you were.
author: Anonymous

text: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: What a man thinks of himself, that it is which determines, or rather indicates, his fate.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes of mind.
author: William James

text: Choose thoughts that fit you well.
author: Anonymous

text: Speak kindly; your nervous system is listening.
author: Anonymous

text: Confidence grows in the reps you cannot post.
author: Anonymous

text: You can be quiet and still be remarkable.
author: Anonymous

text: Your opinion of you sets the weather inside.
author: Anonymous

text: Let progress be louder than perfection.
author: Anonymous

text: Collect evidence of your courage.
author: Anonymous

text: Stand where your feet are and meet the moment.
author: Anonymous

text: Practice being on your own side.
author: Anonymous

text: Dress like you respect the journey.
author: Anonymous

text: You are the narrator—choose a generous script.
author: Anonymous

text: Your pace is allowed to be human.
author: Anonymous

text: Let mistakes be teachers, not tattoos.
author: Anonymous

text: Self-belief is a skill, trained daily.
author: Anonymous

text: You are not behind; you are becoming.
author: Anonymous

text: Take the compliment; it’s a receipt for your effort.
author: Anonymous
